column2: mutate(across(c(ARC...),  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", .x), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == max(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(c(IR., IR..),  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", sprintf("%.4f", .x)), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == max(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(c(ASD..., MD..., MLD) ,  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", .x), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == min(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(1, ~cell_spec(.x, 'latex', bold = ifelse(row_number() == 1 | row_number() == 3, TRUE, FALSE)))
mutate(across(c(ARC...),  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", .x), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == max(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(c(IR., IR..),  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", sprintf("%.4f", .x)), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == max(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(c(ASD..., MD..., MLD) ,  ~cell_spec(ifelse(is.na(.x), "", .x), 'latex', bold = ifelse(!is.na(.x) & .x == min(na.omit(.)), TRUE,  FALSE))),
across(1, ~cell_spec(.x, 'latex', bold = ifelse(row_number() == 1 | row_number() == 3, TRUE, FALSE)))

kable(perf_metrics_base_model_LO_LS_SnP, "pipe", col.names = c("" , "", "ARC(%)", "ASD(%)", "MD(%)", "MLD", "IR*", "IR**"), align = "c", caption = 'Performance statistics for S&P 500 index', padding = -3L)
